mapper.select: SELECT A.product_id productId, A.name name, A.price price, A."desc" desc, A.addr addr, A.details details, A.cate_cd cateCd, A.cre_dt creDt, A.updt_dt updDt, A.user_id userId, 'http://localhost:8091/product-photos/' || A.image image, B.shop_id shopId, B.image imageShop, B.desc descShop, B.shop_nm shopNm FROM public.products A, public."usersShop" B WHERE A.user_id = B.shop_id AND product_id = #{productId}
SELECT 'http://localhost:8091/product-photos/' || image_url image FROM public.images WHERE product_id = #{productId}
